definition: On Encountering Sorrow, poem by Qu Yuan 屈原[Qu1 Yuan2] in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞[Chu3 ci2]
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
trouble/disturbance/rumpus/flirty/coquettish/abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]/literary writings/smell of urine/foul smell/male (animal) (dialect)

sentences.english: Lisao is characteristic of Chu Culture on outside and have inside essence of Yellow River Culture on north China.
sentences.chinese: 《離騷》有楚文化的外部特徵和中原文化的內在實質。

sentences.english: This paper tries to reason the figurative meanings of "running after beauties"with the intrinsic logic of Li Sao.
sentences.chinese: 本文試從《離騷》本身的邏輯來推導“求女”的寓意。

sentences.english: This article indicates that LiSao has unrestrained and gorgeous art characteristics .
sentences.chinese: 本文認爲，《離騷》具有狂放和奇豔的藝術特色。

definition: Chu Ci, the Songs of Chu (ancient book of poems, collected during Han but esp. from country of Chu c. 500 BC)
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
The School Sayings of Confucius (abbr. for 孔子家語|孔子家语[Kong3 zi3 Jia1 yu3])
Yang Xiong (53 BC-18 AD), scholar, poet and lexicographer, author of the first Chinese dialect dictionary 方言[Fang1 yan2]
old verse/poetry in the old style

Tianwen, or Questions to Heaven, a long poem by Chu Yuan 屈原[Qu1 Yuan2]/Tianwen, a series of interplanetary missions developed by the China National Space Administration starting in 2016, named after the poem
Lu Ji (261-303), Chinese writer and literary critic
